data.actual_result: As a non-admin, I can see "Change Category" screen and hidden categories
data.expected_result: As a non-admin, I shouldn't see a "Change Category" screen, nor should i see hidden categories
data.short_description: iOS Channel Settings reveals hidden Categories to non-admin
data.steps_to_repro: - Be a non-admin in a server - Be in any text channel - Click the Channel name on top - Click the current Category - See "Change Category" screen and all available categories even if hidden etc
